title: Impact of coffee on Kenya and El Salvador

content.prompt: Which of the following describes the major impact of the introduction of coffee growing in places like Kenya and El Salvador after 1880 ?

choices.label: The end of taxes paid to the government in cash
The weakening of the European colonial military and landowning elite
Access to cheaper food for Africans and Latin Americans
Increased control over the land by Africans and Latin Americans
Greater dependence on foreign markets by Africans and Latin Americans

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
